hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh" ]; then . /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh fi
GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7`
cd docker/pic-sure-hpds
cat <<EOM > MYDockerfile FROM docker.io/alpine:latest
RUN apk add --no-cache --purge -uU bash && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* /tmp/*
RUN apk add --no-cache --purge -uU curl wget unzip
RUN apk add --no-cache --purge openjdk11
ADD hpds-war-1.0-SNAPSHOT-war-exec.jar /hpds.jar
EXPOSE 8080 EOM echo ""
docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} -f MYDockerfile docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:LATEST cd ../pic-sure-hpds-etl docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST cd ../../
